L

ListenToPort - Class in myChat
this calss is the thread which created to "listen" to the certain port which the server works on, this thread exists to avoid the blocking of GUI when the server starts
ListenToPort(ServerSocket) - Constructor for class myChat.ListenToPort
constuctor which gets the server socket of the server and sets it to be threads server socket, this way the thread can "listen" to the chosen port and avoid blocking in servers GUI
